name: Indian School Equalization
objective: To provide funding for primary and secondary education.

results.description: No Current Data Available Fiscal.  No Information Available.
Indian Affairs fulfilled its program objective by issuing approximately five (5) grants in FY 2020.
Indian Affairs  issued 11 new awards and modifications to existing awards to 10 recipients.
Awards 21 grants to entities to complete the goals and objectives of the program.
This award funded 193 funded for payment tuition of dormitory and transportation, cultural and language enhancement and educational services.

authorizations.text: Indian Self-Determination and Education Assistance Act, Public Law 93-638, as amended, 25 U.S.C. 450 et seq.; Indian Education Amendments of 1978, Public Law 95-561, 25 U.S.C. 2001 et seq.; Tribally Controlled Schools Act, 25 U.S.C. 2501 et seq.
